topic.title: Labor and Delivery Information - conformance rules

section.p: Information directly associated with the labor and delivery process.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it contains information regarding the labor and delivery process.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer
This performer SHALL conform to attendant Participation
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF"
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL conform to attendant Role

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF"
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="ASSIGNED"
This assignedEntity SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] id
An identifier for the birth attendant. The national provider id is expected. A state registration id may be provided as well.
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedPerson
This assignedPerson SHALL conform to Attendant
This assignedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Birth Attendant Titles STATIC
An indication of the professional qualification of the birth attendant. Their title.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Information on the source of payment for the delivery. Not collected for a fetal death report.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it includes payment source information.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD
Information to identify the source of payment for charges associated with delivering the baby.

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Characteristics of Labor and Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.15)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fetal Presentation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
The information is only collected in cases where fetal death is reported. In case of fetal death reporting, it is required.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it indicates whether a hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
Information to identify whether a hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed as a method of delivering the fetus.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] home Birth Plan (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.xxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Maternal Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.xxxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC"
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ROL"
This participantRole MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr
The address for the place where the delivery took place. It is collected in those cases where the delivery did not occur within a healthcare facility.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Place where Birth/Delivery Occurred STATIC
A code that indicates the type of facility or place at which the delivery took place.
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id
An identifer for the facility within which the delivery took place. This attribute is not relevant if the birth took place outside of a health care facility. The attribute repeats to allow entry of both state and nationally assigned identifiers.
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity
This playingEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PLC"
This playingEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This playingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] desc
A description of the place where the birth took place. The attribute is used for those cases in which the delivery occurred neither at a healthcare facility, nor at a place with a defined postal address.
This playingEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] name
The name of the facility at which the delivery took place.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it contains information regarding the labor and delivery process.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] performer
This performer SHALL conform to attendant Participation
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="PRF"
This performer SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] assignedEntity
This assignedEntity SHALL conform to attendant Role

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Information on the source of payment for the delivery. Not collected for a fetal death report.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it includes payment source information.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD
Information to identify the source of payment for charges associated with delivering the baby.

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Characteristics of Labor and Delivery (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.15)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fetal Presentation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.20)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
The information is only collected in cases where fetal death is reported. In case of fetal death reporting, it is required.
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - that it indicates whether a hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
Information to identify whether a hysterotomy or hysterectomy was performed as a method of delivering the fetus.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] home Birth Plan (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.xxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Maternal Transfer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.xxxx)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participant
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="LOC"
This participant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ROL"
This participantRole MAY contain zero or one [0..1] addr
The address for the place where the delivery took place. It is collected in those cases where the delivery did not occur within a healthcare facility.
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Place where Birth/Delivery Occurred STATIC
A code that indicates the type of facility or place at which the delivery took place.
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] id
An identifer for the facility within which the delivery took place. This attribute is not relevant if the birth took place outside of a health care facility. The attribute repeats to allow entry of both state and nationally assigned identifiers.
This participantRole SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity
This playingEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @classCode="PLC"
This playingEntity SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @determinerCode="INSTANCE"
This playingEntity MAY contain zero or one [0..1] desc
A description of the place where the birth took place. The attribute is used for those cases in which the delivery occurred neither at a healthcare facility, nor at a place with a defined postal address.
This playingEntity SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] name
The name of the facility at which the delivery took place.

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <act xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.22"/> <id root="1203224204" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="2097054261"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <assignedEntity> <id root="1053900414" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="320932578"/> </assignedEntity> </performer> <performer typeCode="PRF"> <assignedEntity classCode="ASSIGNED"> <id root="512885691" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="1390383769"/> <assignedPerson/> </assignedEntity> </performer> <participant typeCode="LOC"> <participantRole classCode="ROL"> <id root="679133436" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="1983589150"/> <addr/> <playingEntity classCode="PLC" determinerCode="INSTANCE"/> </participantRole> </participant> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <code code="169148699"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="145081011"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <code code="922223721"/> <value xsi:type="BL"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation/> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.20"/> <id root="554504597" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="1369254626"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.xxx"/> <id root="1383911059" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="2068355119"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.xxxx"/> <id root="167828172" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="1063273932"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <participant typeCode="ORG"> <participantRole classCode="SDLOC"/> </participant> </observation> </entryRelationship> </act>
